data.name: AgreeTermsOfService
data.value: Debes aceptar nuestros Términos de Servicio
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user try to create a new MEGA account without accept previously the 'Terms of Service'.

data.name: CopyFileUnauthorizedAccessException_Title
data.value: Acceso no autorizado
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a file failed because the app or the user don't have write permission to copy into the destination (i.e. copy into a SD card an unsupported file type) - (String as short as possible).

data.name: ClipboardFailed_Title
data.value: Fallo al copiar
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when fails to copy the user's masterkey to the clipboard to be saved or exported - (String as short as possible).

data.name: ClipboardFailed
data.value: No se pudo copiar la clave maestra al portapapeles. Por favor, inténtalo de nuevo
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when fails to copy the user's masterkey to the clipboard to be saved or exported.

data.name: PinLockTooShort_Title
data.value: PIN de bloqueo demasiado corto
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to create or change a PIN lock code and the introduced code is too short (less than 4 digits). Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CacheCleared_Title
data.value: Caché limpiada
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the cache memory is successfully cleared by user request.

data.name: UploadNodeFailed_Title
data.value: Error de subida
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upload a node failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: SelectFileFailed_Title
data.value: Error al seleccionar fichero(s)
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to select files failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: MalformedEmail
data.value: E-mail con formato incorrecto. Por favor, vuelve a intentarlo.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the user types a malformed email address.

data.name: WrongEmailPasswordLogin
data.value: E-mail no asociado con una cuenta de MEGA o contraseña incorrecta. Por favor, vuelve a intentarlo.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user is trying to login with an e-mail that is not associated with a MEGA account or type a wrong password. Preserve the MEGA word in uppercase.

data.name: DeleteNodeQuestion_Title
data.value: ¿Eliminar elemento?
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to delete permanently a node, asking for confirmation to make it - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UpgradeAccountSuccessfully_Title
data.value: Cuenta actualizada
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upgrade an user account finished successfully - (String as short as possible).

data.name: GetPaymentMethodsFailed_Title
data.value: Error al obtener los métodos de pago
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get the payment methods failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: GetPaymentUrlFailed_Title
data.value: Error recuperando Url de pago
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get the payment Url failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: BackgroundAgentDisabled_Title
data.value: Agentes en segundo plano deshabilitados
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed in cases when the user has disabled background agents for this application

data.name: CameraUploadNeedsStayLoggedIn_Title
data.value: Prerrequisitos de las Auto subidas de la cámara
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the user wants to enable auto camera uploads but Stay logged in is disabled.

data.name: DeleteContactQuestion_Title
data.value: ¿Eliminar contacto?
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to remove a contact asking for confirmation to make it - (String as short as possible).

data.name: InviteContactAddSuccessfully_Title
data.value: Contacto invitado
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to invite a contact finished successfully - (String as short as possible).

data.name: ResourceIntensiveTaskDescription
data.value: MEGA subidas automáticas de la cámara
data.comment: Descripton of the task that automatic uploads photos tot MEGA. Seen in the background services Settings screen

data.name: AccountUpdated_Title
data.value: Cuenta actualizada
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the account is updated (upgraded or downgraded).

data.name: SSLKeyError_Title
data.value: Desconectado
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when MEGA SSL key can't be verified (API_ESSL Error).

data.name: DeleteContactFailed_Title
data.value: Error al eliminar
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to remove a contact failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: DeleteContactFailed
data.value: No se pudo eliminar el contacto {0}. Por favor, vuelve a intentarlo. [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to remove a contact failed. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the contact email in runtime. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: DeleteMultipleContactsQuestion_Title
data.value: ¿Eliminar contactos?
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to remove multiple contacts asking for confirmation to make it - (String as short as possible).

data.name: ChangePasswordFailed
data.value: Error al cambiar la contraseña. Por favor, vuelve a intentarlo.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to change the MEGA account password failed.

data.name: ChangePasswordSuccess
data.value: Tu contraseña se ha cambiado.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when change a MEGA account password succesfully.

data.name: RequiredFieldsChangePassword
data.value: Por favor, introduce tu contraseña antigua y tu contraseña nueva.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when required fields for change password are not filled in.

data.name: CloseSessionSucces
data.value: La sesión se ha cerrado correctamente.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when close or kill a session succesfully.

data.name: CleanRubbishBinSuccess
data.value: La papelera se ha vaciado correctamente.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when empty the rubbish bin succesfully.

data.name: CleanRubbishBinFailed
data.value: Error al vaciar la papelera. Por favor, vuelve a intentarlo.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to empty the rubbish bin failed.

data.name: CleanRubbishBinQuestion
data.value: ¿Estás seguro de que quieres eliminar permanentemente todos los archivos de la papelera?
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to empty the rubbish bin, asking for confirmation to do it.

data.name: InviteContactAddFailedOwnEmail
data.value: Estás intentando añadir tu propio e-mail como contacto.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to invite a contact failed because the user is trying to his/her own e-mail.

data.name: RemoveLinkFailed
data.value: Error al eliminar el enlace. Por favor, vuelve a intentarlo.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to remove a link to a node failed.

data.name: NoInternetConnectionMessage
data.value: No se puede realizar esta acción. Por favor, conéctate a Internet y vuelve a intentarlo.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the user is trying to perform any online action without an active Internet connection.

data.name: CloseSessionFailed
data.value: Error al cerrar la sesión. Por favor, vuelve a intentarlo. [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to close or kill session failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: CloseAllSessionsSuccess
data.value: El resto de sesiones se ha cerrado correctamente.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when close or kill all sessions (except current) successfully.

data.name: CloseAllSessionsFailed
data.value: Error al cerrar la sesión. Por favor, vuelve a intentarlo. [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to close or kill all sessions (except current) failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: NewAndOldPasswordMatch
data.value: La contraseña nueva y la antigua no pueden coincidir.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to change his/her MEGA account password and the new password is equal to the old password.

data.name: DeleteMultipleContactsQuestion
data.value: ¿Quieres eliminar {0} contactos?
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to remove multiple contacts, asking for confirmation to make it. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the number of contacts to be removed in runtime.

data.name: AutoCameraUploadFailed
data.value: El servicio de auto subidas de la cámara ha fallado. Puedes volver a activarlo en la página de configuración
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the auto camera upload service failed.

data.name: AutoCameraUploadFailed_Title
data.value: Error del servicio de Auto Subidas de la Cámara
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the auto camera upload service failed.

data.name: SSLKeyError
data.value: No se puede verificar nuestra clave SSL. Podrías estar afectado por un ataque del tipo "man-in-the-middle".
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when MEGA SSL key can't be verified (API_ESSL Error).

data.name: AccountUpdate
data.value: Tu cuenta ha sido actualizada. ¿Quieres comprobar los nuevos detalles de la cuenta?
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the account is updated (upgraded or downgraded).

data.name: InviteContactAddSuccessfully
data.value: El usuario {0} ha sido invitado y aparecerá en tu lista de contactos una vez aceptada la invitación.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to invite a contact finished successfully - (String as short as possible). Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the contact email in runtime.

data.name: InviteContactAddFailed_Title
data.value: Error invitando contacto
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to invite a contact failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: InviteContactAddFailed
data.value: No se pudo enviar la invitación de contacto. Por favor, vuelve a intentarlo.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to invite a contact failed.

data.name: DeleteContactQuestion
data.value: ¿Quieres eliminar el contacto {0}?
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to remove a contact, asking for confirmation to make it. Preserve the {0} code because is for include email of the contact to be removed in runtime.

data.name: CameraUploadNeedsStayLoggedIn
data.value: Para que las subidas automáticas de la cámara funcionen correctamente, es necesario habilitar la opción "Permanecer conectado". ¿Quieres activar esta opción?
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the user wants to enable auto camera uploads but Stay logged in is disabled.

data.name: BackgroundAgentDisabled
data.value: Los agentes MEGA en segundo plano han sido deshabilitados por el usuario
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed in cases when the user has disabled background agents for this application

data.name: GetPaymentUrlFailed
data.value: No se ha podido recuperar la Url de pago. Por favor, vuelve a intentarlo. [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get the payment Url failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: GetPaymentMethodsFailed
data.value: No se han podido recuperar los métodos de pago. Por favor, vuelve a intentarlo. [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get the payment methods failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: UpgradeAccountSuccessfully
data.value: ¡Cuenta actualizada correctamente!
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upgrade an user account finished successfully.

data.name: UpgradeAccountFailed_Title
data.value: Fallo al actualizar la cuenta
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upgrade an user account failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UpgradeAccountFailed
data.value: La operación no ha terminado correctamente. No se efectuará el cargo en la tarjeta.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upgrade an user account failed.

data.name: RequiredFieldsCancelSubscription
data.value: Por favor, escribe un mensaje para nosotros. Gracias.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when required fields for cancel subscription are not filled in.

data.name: CancelSubscription_Title
data.value: Cancelar subscripción
data.comment: Title of the dialogs displayed when a user is trying to cancel a subscription - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CancelSubscriptionSuccessfully_Title
data.value: Subscripción cancelada
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to cancel a subscription finished successfully - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CancelSubscriptionSuccessfully
data.value: La subscripción ha sido cancelada correctamente.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to cancel a subscription finished successfully.

data.name: CancelSubscriptionFailed_Title
data.value: Error al cancelar la subscripción
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to cancel a subscription failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CancelSubscriptionFailed
data.value: La subscripción no ha sido cancelada correctamente. Por favor, contacta con support@mega.nz para cancelar tu subscripción.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to cancel a subscription failed.

data.name: CancelSubscriptionConfirmation
data.value:
¡Gracias por tu comentario!
¿Estás seguro de que quieres cancelar tu subscripción a Mega?
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user is trying to cancel a subscription, asking for confirmation to do it.

data.name: CancelSubscription
data.value: Estás a punto de cancelar tu subscripción a Mega. Por favor, dinos si hay algo que podamos hacer para hacerte cambiar de opinión.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user is trying to cancel a subscription, asking him send a feedback message.

data.name: WrongDataFormat_Title
data.value: Formato de datos incorrecto
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed in cases that the user types some data with a wrong format - (String as short as possible).

data.name: WrongDataFormatCreditCardPayment
data.value: El número de la tarjeta de crédito, el mes, el año y el CVV deben ser números. Por favor, comprueba que los datos introducidos son correctos e inténtalo de nuevo.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user fill some data with a wrong format during a credit card payment.

data.name: RequiredFieldsCreditCardPayment
data.value: Por favor, introduce todos los campos requeridos y vuelve a intentarlo.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when required fields for credit card payment are not filled in.

data.name: CreditCardStoreFailed_Title
data.value: Error al almacenar la tarjeta de crédito
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to store a user credit card failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CreditCardStoreFailed
data.value: La información de la tarjeta de crédito no es correcta. No se efectuará el cargo en la tarjeta.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to store a user credit card failed.

data.name: ShortCutFailed_Title
data.value: Error en el acceso directo
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the user is trying to open an invalid shortcut - (String as short as possible).

data.name: ShortCutFailed
data.value: Ocurrió un error al intentar abrir un acceso directo. Puede ser que sea un acceso directo no válido o que el destino fue eliminado.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the user is trying to open an invalid shortcut.

data.name: SaveSettingsFailed_Title
data.value: Fallo al guardar la configuración
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to save settings failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: SaveSettingsFailed
data.value: Error al guardar la configuración. Por favor, inténtalo de nuevo [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to save settings failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: CaptureVideoFailed_Title
data.value: Fallo al capturar el video
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to capture video failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CaptureVideoFailed
data.value: Error al capturar el video. Por favor, vuelve a intentarlo [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to capture video failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: CapturePhotoVideoFailed_Title
data.value: Fallo al capturar foto/video
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to capture photo or video failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CapturePhotoVideoFailed
data.value: Ocurrió un error al capturar la foto o el video. Por favor, vuelve a intentarlo [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to capture photo or video failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: CapturePhotoFailed_Title
data.value: Fallo al capturar la foto
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to capture photo failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CapturePhotoFailed
data.value: Error al capturar la foto. Por favor, vuelve a intentarlo [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to capture photo failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: GetUserDataFailed_Title
data.value: Falló la recuperación de datos de usuario
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get the user data failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: GetUserDataFailed
data.value: Error al recuperar tus datos de usuario. Por favor, inténtalo de nuevo. [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get the user data failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: DeleteNodeQuestion
data.value: Estás seguro de que quieres eliminar permanentement {0}?
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to delete permanently a node, asking for confirmation to make it. Preserve the {0} code because is for include name of the node to be removed in runtime.

data.name: SelectFileFailed
data.value: Error al seleccionar fichero(s). Por favor, inténtalo de nuevo [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to select files failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: UploadNodeFailed
data.value: Error al subir el archivo. Por favor, vuelve a intentarlo. [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upload a node failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: SelectFolderFailed_Title
data.value: Error al seleccionar carpeta
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to select a folder failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: SelectFolderFailed
data.value: Error al seleccionar la carpeta. Por favor, inténtalo de nuevo o selecciona otra carpeta: [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to select a folder failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: QuestionAskedDownloadOption_YesButton
data.value: sí, exportar
data.comment: Button of the dialog displayed the first time that a user want to download a image. Option automatically download to the photo album after downloads - (String as short as possible).

data.name: QuestionAskedDownloadOption_Title
data.value: Opciones de descarga
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed the first time that a user want to download a image. Asks if wants to export image files to the photo album after download in future and informs that user can change this option afterwards - (String as short as possible).

data.name: QuestionAskedDownloadOption_NoButton
data.value: no, sólo local
data.comment: Button of the dialog displayed the first time that a user want to download a image. Option to only download into the local folder of the app and don't export automatically to the photo album after downloads - (String as short as possible).

data.name: MemoryLimitError_Title
data.value: Límite de memoria
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the app exceeds the memory limit quota of the device - (String as short as possible).

data.name: MemoryLimitError
data.value: No hay sufiente espacio libre en la memoria para completar esta operación. La aplicación se cerrará ahora.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the app exceeds the memory limit quota of the device.

data.name: CacheCleared
data.value: La caché se ha limpiado con éxito
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the cache memory is successfully cleared by user request.

data.name: PinLockTooShort
data.value: El PIN de bloqueo debe tener al menos 4 dígitos.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to create or change a PIN lock code and the introduced code is too short (less than 4 digits). Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word.

data.name: CurrentPinLockCodeDoNotMatch_Title
data.value: El PIN de bloqueo actual no coincide
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user is trying to change the PIN lock code and introduces an incorrect code into the field for the current PIN lock code - (String as short as possible). Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word.

data.name: MasterkeyCopied_Title
data.value: Clave maestra copiada
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when copy the user's masterkey to the clipboard to be saved or exported - (String as short as possible).

data.name: MasterkeyCopied
data.value: Clave maestra copiada al portapapeles
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when copy the user's masterkey to the clipboard to be saved or exported.

data.name: CurrentPinLockCodeDoNotMatch
data.value: El PIN de bloqueo actual es incorrecto o no coincide
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user is trying to change the PIN lock code and introduces an incorrect code into the field for the current PIN lock code. Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word.

data.name: CopyFileUnauthorizedAccessException
data.value: No tienes permisos para copiar este tipo de archivo en la carpeta de destino. Probablemente estás intentando guardar/copiar en una tarjeta SD un archivo de un tipo no soportado. Por favor, intenta guardar/copiar el archivo en la memoria interna de tu dispositivo.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a file failed because the app or the user don't have write permission to copy into the destination (i.e. copy into a SD card an unsupported file type).

data.name: CopyFileFailed_Title
data.value: Fallo al copiar el archivo
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a file failed by a non specific cause - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CopyFileFailed
data.value: No se pudo copiar el archivo seleccionado: [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a file failed by a non specific cause. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: SessionIDError_Title
data.value: Desconectado
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the user is logged out from another location and is trying to do any operation that requires a valid session (API_ESID Error) - (String as short as possible).

data.name: PrepareFileForUploadFailed_Title
data.value: Error preparando el archivo
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to prepare a file for upload failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: PrepareFileForUploadFailed
data.value: No se pudo preparar el archivo: {0} para la subida.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to prepare a file for upload failed. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the file name in runtime.

data.name: NoDownloadLocationSelected
data.value:
No has seleccionado una ubicación de descarga predeterminada para los archivos.
Para continuar con la descarga, por favor selecciona una carpeta de destino o ve a preferencias para configurar la ubicación de descarga predeterminada.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to download some nodes and the app doesn't have configured a default download location. Asks the user to select a location for this download or configure a default location.

data.name: OverquotaAlert_Title
data.value: ¡Límite superado!
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user makes and operation that exceeds the storage space limits of the account (overquota error). Asks if user wants to upgrade the account type - (String as short as possible).

data.name: OverquotaAlert
data.value: Operación no permitida, se superará el límite de almacenamiento de tu cuenta. ¿Deseas actualizar tu cuenta?
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user makes and operation that exceeds the storage space limits of the account (overquota error). Asks if user wants to upgrade the account type.

data.name: SessionIDError
data.value: Se ha cerrado la sesión de este dispositivo desde otra ubicación
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the user is logged out from another location and is trying to do any operation that requires a valid session (API_ESID Error).

data.name: PinLockCodesDoNotMatch_Title
data.value: Los códigos de bloqueo PIN no coinciden
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to create or change a PIN lock code and the introduced codes don't match. Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word - (String as short as possible).

data.name: PinLockCodesDoNotMatch
data.value: Los códigos de bloqueo PIN no coinciden. Por favor, vuelve a escribirlos y asegúrate de que son iguales.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to create or change a PIN lock code and the introduced codes don't match. Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word.

data.name: LoadNodesFailed_Title
data.value: Error al cargar
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to load the nodes of the MEGA cloud service - (String as short as possible).

data.name: LoadNodesFailed
data.value: No se pudieron cargar los archivos y carpetas de MEGA. Por favor, inténtalo de nuevo o haz clic en actualizar.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to load the nodes of the MEGA cloud service.

data.name: UploadSelfieFailed_Title
data.value: Error al subir el selfie
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upload a selfie picture failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UploadSelfieFailed
data.value: No se pudo subir la imagen selfie.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upload a selfie picture failed.

data.name: OpenFileFailed_Title
data.value: Error al abrir el archivo
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to open a file failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: OpenFileFailed
data.value: No se pudo abrir el archivo seleccionado.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to open a file failed.

data.name: FileNotFound_Title
data.value: No se encuentra el archivo
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user try to open a file that can't be found and the process failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: FileNotFound
data.value: No se pudo encontrar el archivo seleccionado.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user try to open a file that can't be found and the process failed.

data.name: PhotoUploadError_Title
data.value: Error al subir la foto
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upload a photo failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: PhotoUploadError
data.value: No se pudo subir la foto.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upload a photo failed.

data.name: PrepareImageForUploadFailed_Title
data.value: Error preparando la imagen
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to prepare a image for upload failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: PrepareImageForUploadFailed
data.value: No se pudo preparar la imagen: {0} para la subida.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to prepare a image for upload failed. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the file name in runtime.

data.name: MinimalPictureSelection_Title
data.value: No se seleccionó ninguna imagen
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to do a multi image upload and haven't selected any element - (String as short as possible).

data.name: MinimalPictureSelection
data.value: Por favor, selecciona mínimo 1 imagen para subir.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to do a multi image upload and haven't selected any element.

data.name: ResumingTransfersFailed_Title

data.name: QuestionAskedDownloadOption
data.value: ¿Quieres exportar automáticamente los archivos de imagen a tu álbum de fotos después de la descarga? Puedes cambiar esta opción en la página ajustes posteriormente. Otros tipos de archivo sólo se almacenará en el almacenamiento local de la aplicación.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed the first time that a user want to download a image. Asks if wants to export image files to the photo album after download in future and informs that user can change this option afterwards.

data.name: DownloadLimitMessage_Title
data.value: Número de descargas
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user would try to download at the same time more nodes than the reliable number of simultaneous downloads for a good app performance. This dialog ask confirmation to start the download process - (String as short as possible).

data.name: DownloadLimitMessage
data.value: Has seleccionado más de {0} elementos ({0}) para descargar. ¿Desea continuar?
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user would try to download at the same time more nodes than the reliable number of simultaneous downloads for a good app performance. This dialog ask confirmation to start the download process. Preserve the ({0}) codes because is for include the maximum reliable download number and the precise number of nodes to be downloaded in runtime.

data.name: WrongPassword_Title

data.value: La contraseña escrita es incorrecta.
